#Installation of msoffice add-ins.

= Excel =

 # Download excelsvn.xla
 # Copy the file to the following folders.

  || Office97 SR2 || C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office\Library ||

 # Check Excelsvn check box in Tool/Addin... of Excel main menu.

= Word =

 # Download wordlsvn.xla
 # Copy the file to the following folders.

  || Office97 SR2 || C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office\Library ||
